problem_text_cn: 如图,线段AB=CD=10cm．弧BC和弧DA是弧长与半径都相等的圆弧,曲边三角形BCD的面积,是以D为圆心,DC为半径的圆面积的\frac{1}{4},则阴影部分的面积是()cm²．
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the line segment AB = CD = N_0. The arc BC and the arc DA are arcs with the same arc length and radius. The area of ​​the curved triangle BCD is \frac{N_1}{N_2} of the area of ​​the circle with D as the center and DC as the radius, and the area of ​​the shaded part is ()^ 2.
raw_answer: 解:如图所示:阴影部分的面积=正方形ABDE的面积．正方形ABDE的面积=10×10=100cm²．故选:C．
raw_comment: 考查了平移的性质和正方形的性质,解题的关键是将不规则图形的面积转化为规则图形的面积的计算．
